subject: {{sender.contact_name}}'s finance application has been approved! The job is ready to start.

body.text: Great news! The job is ready to start.

rows.text: {{sender.contact_name}} has signed their credit agreement and the finance for the job is now in place. You can now begin the work when you'd like. Remember, the job has to be completed within 6 months of this email being sent to you.

rows.subtext: If something isn't right let us know by emailing help@kanda.co.uk.
